parameters.name: AscendingSequence
parameters.description:
The order in which the files are sorted. Valid values:

*   true: ascending order
*   false: descending order

parameters.name: Edition
parameters.description: The version of the SourceMap file.

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The ID of the SourceMap file.

parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: The keyword in the file name. The files are searched by keyword.

parameters.name: OrderField
parameters.description:
The criterion by which the files are sorted. Valid values:

*   version: The files are sorted by version.
*   uploadTime: The files are sorted by upload time.
